QuestData.Title: A Tale of Two Shovels
QuestData.Description: Hey wait a minute, this bone has pickax marks on it. These aren't yours, are they? No, I recognize this mark... this must be that blasted dwarf! Gah!$b$bLet me step back for a minute and explain. There's another archaeologist south of here named Durrin Direshovel. He practices a reckless, devil-may-care brand of archaeology that offends even me.$B$BA priceless fossil, ruined by sloppy pick-work. This is the last straw, Durrin!$b$b$n, go put an end to Direshovel and his negligent excavation.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Reckless archaeology shall not go unpunished.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Durrin Direshovel and obtain Durrin's Archaeological Findings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is the deed done? Did you manage to salvage his notes?
QuestData.RewardText: I knew it! Durrin HAS been digging around here. And he's been excavating what could be the archaeological find of the century! Now I just have to find out where he's stashing the bones...$b$bThanks $n. You've been a great help.
